name: RuPaul
headerDescription: RuPaul’s resume shows a life of great struggle and great accomplishment. It conveys personality and style while telling a compelling story. The result is an example of an entertainment industry resume that’s memorable and, dare we say, even fun.
description: A resume example that adeptly brings together struggles, accomplishments, and plenty of personality.
pageTitle: RuPaul's Entertainment Industry Resume Example | Enhancv
pageDescription: Leave it to supermodel and TV host RuPaul to show everyone what an entertainment industry resume with personality should be.
twitterText: @RuPaul's resume has truly pulled the pageant tonight. 10s, 10s, 10s across the board.
facebookText: @RuPaul's resume would come around and make everyone else look like they're walking first time in drags at a ball #DragRace #RPDR #Rupaul #Drag

sections.description: From Society’s outskirts, RuPaul has been working for decades to bring counter-culture and irreverence into the mainstream. His style and individuality come through in everything he does, from movies to television, books to music.

data.title: RuPaul’s Drag Race
data.description: The premier showcase of drag talent in the US, Drag Race has brought an unprecedented level of cultural influence and appreciation to drag. To date it’s launched the careers of over 100 drag artists.

data.title: The RuPaul Show
data.description: His first foray into television had RuPaul interviewing a wide variety of celebrity guests, pop icons, and actors. In doing so, he also became the first openly gay TV show host in US history.

data.title: Moving to Atlanta
data.description: The choice to move to a new place where I could grow at just 15 was one of the most important decisions of my life.

data.title: Marrying my Husband
data.description: Shanté you stay, George.

data.title: AJ and the Queen
data.description: Coming to Netflix, I will star as Ruby Red in a show following a larger-than-life but down-on-her-luck drag queen.

sections.description: His typical day

data.title: Polishing my shrine to Judge Judy

finalDescription: What does the resume of someone who speaks shade as a native language look like? RuPaul has the answer.

name: Casey Neistat
smallHeaderDescription: You don’t get more than 9 million Youtube subscribers without learning a few lessons along the way.
headerDescription: Every time he tries something new, Casey shows the importance of knowing why you do what you do. He also shows why success can be dangerous. His unique example of a filmmaker resume tells that story.
description: From living in a trailer park and washing dishes to becoming a defining Youtube filmmaker, Casey’s story has a lot to teach.
pageTitle: Casey Neistat’s Filmmaker Resume Example | Enhancv
pageDescription: Casey Neistat has a great example of a creative filmmaker resume. It shows successes, failures, and includes some insights into why success often isn't enough.
twitterText: @CaseyNeistat shows us why the connection between #achievinggoals and feeling #satisfaction isn’t so simple | via @Enhancv
facebookText: If you’ve ever achieved something and not felt satisfied, @cneistat has some important lessons to teach you | via @Enhancv

sections.description: Casey’s rise from living in a trailer park to being a world-famous filmmaker came through the success of his big life projects.

data.title: Beme
data.description: An app for sharing video: no edits, filters, likes, or comments. It was for capturing moments in those moments and not on a screen. The company was bought by CNN for $25 million and is now a Youtube news channel.

data.title: The CaseyNeistat Youtube Channel
data.description: A vlog that’s so much more. It’s what let Neistat step away from the red carpet and become the filmmaker he always wanted to be. The channel has over 9 million subscribers, 2 billion views, and brand partnerships with Nike, Samsung, Google, J-Crew, Mercedes Benz, and Finn Jewelry.

data.title: The Hollywood Thing
data.description: Neistat produced some movies, went to Sundance and Cannes, and won some awards before getting disillusioned with Hollywood. He decided his path to becoming a filmmaker was through Youtube. Neistat was involved in films like The Pleasure of Being Robbed, Daddy Longlegs, and Bolt from the Blue

data.title: The Neistat Brothers
data.description: Neistat spent a year creating eight 25 minute movies with his brother Van. They sold the series to HBO for almost $2 million.

data.title: Pulling his life together
data.description: After dropping out of high school, running away at 15, and getting his girlfriend pregnant

data.title: Finding his own path
data.description: By realizing there’s other ways to achieve his dream of being a filmmaker

data.title: Sticking with NYC, Filmmaking, Youtube, and Candice
data.description: Despite 9/11, Hollywood BS, demonetizing, and breakups

data.title: Surviving 534 daily vlogs
data.description: By committing to challenge himself every day and stopping when it got easy

sections.description: His typical day

finalDescription: Inspired by Casey Neistat’s story, we created a guide to finding your definition of success. It walks you through choosing goals and how to understand why that’s your goal.

name: Elon Musk
position: CEO of SpaceX, Tesla, and Neuralink
smallHeaderDescription: Elon Musk’s resume shows how a CEO can bring together personality, values, and passions.
headerDescription: When you’ve worked in car manufacturing, space exploration, online payments, and more, it’s hard to make a cohesive resume. But Musk's shows how it's possible by tying them together with his passion.
description: A one page CEO resume actually can represent someone as varied as Elon Musk.
pageTitle: Elon Musk’s CEO Resume Example in One Page | Enhancv
pageDescription: Even if you don't need a CEO resume, Elon Musk's example shows how anyone can make a one page resume that really stands out and leaves a lasting impression
twitterText: Even a ‘hat salesman’ like @elonmusk can have an epic #resume that would make anyone proud | via @Enhancv
facebookText: Ever wondered what Elon Musk’s resume would look like? @Enhancv shows how the man of the future would create the resume of the future.

sections.description: These are just a few of the world-changing projects Musk works on.

data.title: SpaceX
data.description: Space Exploration Technologies Corp., doing business as SpaceX, is a private American aerospace manufacturer and space transportation services company headquartered in Hawthorne, CA.

data.title: Tesla
data.description: Tesla, Inc. is an American company that specializes in electric vehicles, energy storage and solar panel manufacturing based in Palo Alto, California.

data.title: Neuralink
data.description: Neuralink is an American neurotechnology company founded by Elon Musk and eight others, reported to be developing implantable interfaces.

sections.description: What kind of strengths have made Elon Musk into a real-life Tony Stark?

data.title: Enthusiastic Learner
data.description: Got the full 6-month Commodore manual in 3 days, made a game, sold it for $500 at age 12.

data.title: Excellent at Budget Management
data.description: Lived on $1/day during college, eating mostly hot dogs to learn that money doesn’t really matter.

data.title: Lord of the Rings
data.description: Gave 3 engagement rings to his wife Tallulah, one of which he designed personally.

sections.description: His Time

data.title: Creating electric cars consumers dream of

finalDescription: What does it take to be Elon Musk? Is it a high IQ, a huge net worth, or just raw determination. His resume shows  how even someone working on 6 major projects can balance their work, passions, and personality.

name: Marissa Mayer
description: Marissa’s resume shows her rise to become a major tech company CEO.
headerDescription: From the first female employee at Google to CEO of Yahoo!, Mayer’s CEO resume tells the story of a career marked by persistence, hard work, and results. Her resume example also shows how women can succeed in both the technology and business worlds.
pageTitle: Marissa Mayer’s Yahoo CEO Resume Example | Enhancv
pageDescription: Marissa Mayer's CEO resume example has actionable tips and ideas allowing anyone can have an impactful and memorable resume
twitterText: The #resume @Enhancv created for @marissamayer has been changing how people see resumes. Check it out to see why
facebookText: See the Marissa Mayer resume that’s been changing how people stand out with a resume. | via @Enhancv

sections.description: Marissa spent most of her career at Google and her resume show’s how she grew within that company. Now, she’s taking on the challenge of running Yahoo! In challenging times.

data.title: Google
data.description: In 13 years, Mayer moved from a humble product engineer all the way to Vice President of Location & Location Services. Along the way, she helped shape Google as a world-beating company with outstanding UI and powerful location tools.

data.title: Yahoo!
data.description: Mayer is working to adapt Yahoo! to the reality of a changing internet landscape through acquisitions and mergers.

sections.description: Mayer’s list of what she’s most proud of really reinforces and contextualizes her work experience. You see the time she spent at Google and can guess what it took to rise within the company, but her she spells out what she’s taken away from those experiences.

data.title: Courage she had
data.description: To take a sinking ship and make it float

data.title: Persistence & Loyalty
data.description: She showed through hard times at Yahoo!

data.title: Google’s Growth
data.description: From 100k daily searches to 1 billion+

data.title: Inspiring women in tech
data.description: By being the youngest CEO on Fortune’s list of the 50 most powerful women

sections.description: Her typical day

data.title: Showing Yahoo employees their work has meaning
Building a biz-dev strategy for Yahoo!’s future after the Verizon acquisition
Serving on the boards of the New York and San Francisco ballet companies
Creating spreadsheet for her amazing cupcake recipe

finalDescription: Taken together, what does the resume of a woman who’s shaped one of the world’s leading companies look like?

name: Mark Zuckerberg
smallHeaderDescription: Imagine Mark Zuckerburg’s resume before founding Facebook.
headerDescription: His software developer resume is an example of how you can showcase your passions, philosophy, and ambitions to create an impactful resume before you’ve landed your first real job.
pageTitle: Mark Zuckerberg Software Developer Resume Example | Enhancv
pageDescription: Mark Zuckerbeg's pre-Facebook software developer resume is a great example for anyone looking for tips on standing out as a young developer without work experience.
twitterText: Turns out @MarkZuckerberg had a pretty impressive #resume even before #Facebook. Created with @Enhancv
facebookText: Even before Facebook, Mark Zuckerberg had a resume that really stood out. Check out how @Enhancv shows it.
description: Showing him at the moment he founded Facebook, Zuckerberg’s resume shows a college student who knows how to show projects and impact.

sections.description: Zuckerberg’s pre-Facebook projects showed an early interest in leveraging technology to connect people.

data.title: Facemash
data.description: A social website which allows visitors to compare two student pictures side-by-side and let them choose who’s “hot” and who’s “not”

data.title: CourseMarch
data.description: The first social media tool allowing college students to choose classes based on the choices of other students and form study groups

data.title: Synapse Media Player
data.description: Synapses is an app that uses artificial intelligence to learn a user’s listening habits and recommend music based on their taste

data.title: Proficient
data.description: In six languages

data.title: Developed first
data.description: Software application at age 12

data.title: Founded
data.description: Two of the most used apps at Harvard

data.title: 10+ Prizes
data.description: In math, astronomy, physics, and classics

data.title: Captained
data.description: His prep school fencing team

sections.description: Even in university, Zuckerberg was an outrageous polyglot. His resume shows just what a prolific learner he was in high school.

finalTitle: Mark Zuckerberg’s Software Developer Resume Example
finalDescription: Even without any official work experience, Zuckerberg’s resume shows how you can turn projects and achievements into a compelling resume. This is a great example of what you can do with a student resume.

name: Barack Obama
position: Former President of the United States
headerDescription: Even Presidents need resumes. Obama's resume shows how even when you're focusing mostly on your accomplishments from a single job, you can still show your values, strengths, and what you're most proud of.
pageDescription: Obama's resume shows just how diverse his experience is as well as showcasing his major accomplishments in a single page.
twitterText: This #resume of @BarackObama shows how a #POTUS can show pride in what they’ve accomplished. | via @Enhancv
facebookText: Barack Obama’s resume shows how a POTUS can show pride in their accomplishments.  | via @Enhancv
description: It takes a special kind of one page resume to show Barack Obama’s political career.

sections.description: It’s hard to imagine a bigger undertaking than serving 8 years as President, but Obama’s resume manages to make it succinct and impactful. Not to mention his rise in Illinois politics.

data.title: President of the United States
data.description: Starting off passing a stimulus to end the recession and enacting once in a lifetime healthcare reform before moving on to winding down the Iraq war, legalizing marriage for all, and fighting climate change.

data.title: Illinois Senator
data.description: Beginning with strong opposition to the Iraq war, Obama’s senate career focused on government transparency and national security. While he co-sponsored a number of successful bills, he also failed to pass bills protecting voters from intimidation and de-escalating the Iraq war.

data.title: State Senator
data.description: Obama fought predatory lending and racial profiling while increasing tax credits and subsidies for childcare.

data.title: Raising his daughters
data.description: With the help of his amazing wife Michelle!

data.title: Awarded the Nobel Peace Prize
data.description: In honor of “extraordinary efforts to strengthen international diplomacy”

data.title: Elected as the first African-American President of the United States
Led the raid that took out Osama Bin Laden

sections.description: A Day in His Life

data.title: Family time with Michelle and the girls
Laughing at Obama and Biden memes

photoBy: Pete Souza, The Obama-Biden Transition Project
finalDescription: What does the resume of a president look like? It’s certainly not easy fitting everything a president might do in their lifetime into a single page, but Obama’s resume shows how you can make the right choices for the greatest impact.

name: Travis Kalanick
smallHeaderDescription: Kalanick's resume shows the power of being open about your strengths and your weaknesses.
headerDescription: It doesn't shy away from being frank about times he bent the rules and occasionally fell on his face. But through these stories, his resume shows just who he is as a CEO.
pageTitle: Travis Kalanick's Entrepreneur Resume Example | Enhancv
pageDescription: Travis Kalanick's resume example shows what an entrepreneur's resume should be: bold, impact driven, and full of passionate energy
twitterText: The new way of writing a #resume in 2018! Here’s some inspiration from @travisk and @Enhancv.
facebookText: This @traviskal resume shows how following your passions can lead to big things. @Enhancv makes it possible.
description: Kalanick has a resume that’s not shy about when he’s bended the rules to push forward.

sections.description: Before Uber, Travis built two companies on peer to peer technology and established his hard earned reputation as a risk taker. With Uber, he’s taken it to the next level.

data.title: Uber
data.description: Built the largest privately held tech company in the world with a valuation of over $65 billion, all while revolutionizing transportation and outcompeting our challengers. Uber is used over 40 million times a month and has become a fundamental tech product of our time.

data.title: Red Swoosh
data.description: Building on his previous peer to peer experience, Red Swoosh raised millions to create a closed P2P network for transferring large media files. He hustled the project, worked without a salary for years, and ultimately sold it for nearly $20 million.

data.title: Scour Inc.
data.description: He helped build an enormous multimedia search engine and peer to peer file sharing service revolutionary enough to get investment from a former president of Disney and fearless enough to fight off $250 billion in copyright lawsuits.

data.title: Protected our drivers from fines
data.description: Detected when law enforcement were using our app and told them no cars were available nearby

data.title: Pulled a fast one on Apple
data.description: Tested the limits of the App Store’s T&C and covered it, yet Tim Cook caught them and threatened to remove Uber from the App Store

data.title: Persuaded drivers to drop our biggest competitor
data.description: We figured out when one person drives for both Lyft and Uber and started sending more orders their way

sections.description: A Day in His Life

data.title: Putting out fires, bending rules and solving complex problems
Protecting his privacy while keeping tabs on the competition
Irritating city officials and the cab industry
Persuading celebrities into advisory roles at Uber, including Jay Z, Beyonce, Edward Norton, and Leonardo DiCaprio

finalDescription: When you’re a unique blend of high achiever, risk taker, and bomb thrower, you need a resume that shows you in all your complexity. Kalanick’s resume does just that, balancing his passions and achievements with his more unconventional methods for dealing with problems.

name: Sheryl Sandberg
pageTitle: Sheryl Sandberg's COO Resume Example | Enhancv
headerDescription: Sheryl Sandberg has become a sometimes controversial thinker on how women can succeed in their careers. Whether you’re a fan of her Lean In movement or not, her COO resume example has a fascinating story to tell.
pageDescription: Sheryl Sandberg's resume example shows how you can balance the personal and the professional to stand out as a COO
twitterText: @sherylsandberg’s @Enhancv #resume is as inspirational as she is, balancing #motherhood and that #leanin attitude all in one page
facebookText: This resume @Enhancv created for @sherylsandberg shows just how you can show your strengths and identity as a woman, mother, and a professional on a resume that would make anyone proud
description: Sandberg’s resume shows how she can be a COO, mother, and author.

sections.description: By focusing on her career in technology and less on her prior political work, Sandberg’s resume details just how she successfully built two of the top performing online ad teams in history all while making the world better for working women.

data.title: Facebook
data.description: She took her experience building Google’s ad team to Facebook, growing that revenue stream even faster to make the company profitable in just two years. Now, the team she built drives 85% of Facebook’s revenue. She’s also worked on building strategic partnerships with companies like Yahoo!.

data.title: The Lean In Foundation
data.description: Beyond simply writing the book, she turned Lean In into a community of over 33k women in 150 countries devoted to empowering each other. By creating powerful partnerships with role models like Beyonce, Lean In has made a real difference for women in the workplace.

data.title: Google
data.position: VP of Global Online Sales and Operations
data.description: She scaled their online sales team by 1,000% in 5 years (from 4 to 4,000) all while maintaining the quality of the organization such that we provided 2/3 of Google’s revenue.

data.title: Making Facebook profitable
data.description: Only 2 years after joining through a rigorous focus on advertising

data.title: Having a set at the table
data.description: Of the board of directors at 5 influential companies including Walt Disney, Facebook, and Survey Monkey

data.title: Building exceptional teams
data.description: By connecting with people on an emotional level, spotting their talents & helping them believe in their capabilities

data.title: Inspiring women
data.description: And becoming a leading voice for gender equality after giving a TED Talk (4M views) and writing her first book - Lean In

sections.description: A Day in Her Life

data.title: Research how people use social media to improve Facebook’s ads targeting

finalDescription: Balancing your work, a passion project, and who you are as a mother all in one resume is no easy task. Sandberg’s resume example shows how anyone can do just that. By sticking to the most important metrics and accomplishments, there’s space for Sandberg to show other sides of herself beyond her role as COO of Facebook.

name: Hillary Clinton
position: Former First Lady, Senator, and Secretary of State
pageTitle: Hillary Clinton's Politician Resume Example | Enhancv
headerDescription: Hillary Clinton has worked in a fish cannery and served on the board of Wal-mart, but she can still have a one page resume. From explaining her political beliefs to detailing her accomplishments, a standout one page politician resume is all she needs to show herself as a person and a professional.
pageDescription: Even non-politicians can learn from Hillary Clinton's resume example. It shows how a lifetime of work in various fields can fit into a single page that shows impact and stands out.
twitterText: @HillaryClinton’s @Enhancv #resume shows what an impact a single page can have
facebookText: This @Enhancv created resume shows how a single page can sum up a life as varied as @hillaryclinton’s. We think she’d be proud of this one.
description: Even when you’re as famous as Clinton, the right resume can still surprise.

sections.description: Focusing on her work in the public sector, Clinton’s life projects tie together her greatest passions and shows how she’s applied herself towards those goals wherever she is.

data.title: Secretary of State
data.description: Clinton’s time as Secretary of State blended a hard-nosed focus on national security issues like denuclearization alongside a major soft-power push with a focus on women and LGBTQ rights.

data.title: US Senator from New York
data.description: Taking the reigns after 9/11, Clinton worked to get funding to rebuild New York and to ensure the wars which followed made the country safer. Later, she worked to build progressive political infrastructure and forge bipartisan ties.

data.title: First Lady of the United States
data.description: Clinton revolutionized the role of first lady by taking an active role in forming vital policy. While her efforts on healthcare ended in failure, her work has defined the role ever since, with subsequent first ladies each taking on issues to advocate for.

data.title: Being the most admired woman in America
data.description: And third most admired woman in the world

data.title: 30+ years of experience in public service
data.description: Working to serve the country she loves

data.title: Built a great family
data.description: By working through issues and supporting her daughter

data.title: Committed to women and children
data.description: By doing pro-bono work throughout her career

sections.description: A Day in Her Life

data.title: Make life easier for the average American and the middle class
Improve access to meaningful, gainful employment for people with disabilities
Establish America as the world’s clean energy superpower
Make debt-free college and universal healthcare a reality for all Americans
Fight for full federal equality for LGBT Americans
Restore basic fairness to our tax code
End the epidemic of gun violence

finalDescription: The title under her name says it all, Clinton’s long career has made her many things. Her resume example takes it all together and shows just what impact she’s had over three decades of public service.

name: Angela Merkel
headerDescription: Named the most powerful woman in the world for 9 of the past 10 years, Angela Merkel's resume isn't short on accomplishments. But it also shows how what she's most proud of defines her. So what she did the night the Berlin Wall fell is more than a story, it's a statement about how she views the world and her work.
pageTitle: Angela Merkel's Female Leader Resume Example | Enhancv
pageDescription: How does the "most powerful woman in the world" create a powerful resume as a female leader? It comes with a balance between personal and professional to stand out and show impact.
twitterText: Angela Merkel has been named the most #powerfulwoman in the world 9 of the last 10 years. Her @Enhancv #resumes shows why.
facebookText: Think the resume of the most powerful woman in the world (according to @Forbes) can’t be one page? @Enhancv thinks otherwise.
description: The most powerful woman in the world deserves a resume that really leaves an impression.

sections.description: Leaving off an impressive career as a research scientist, Merkel’s life projects show the aptitude and persistence to climb through the political ranks. Along the way, she’s pioneered female leadership in Germany, Europe, and the world.

data.title: Chancellor of the Federal Republic of Germany
data.description: Over more than a decade as Chancellor, Merkel has had to navigate extreme crises like the global financial crisis and the European refugee crisis. Through it all she’s focused on delivering economic results, stable leadership, and humane policies.

data.title: Chairman of the CDU
data.description: Climbed the ladder from an East German research scientist, through deputy spokesperson, Minister of Women & Youth, Minister of the Environment and Nuclear Safety, Secretary-General to the first female leader of the CDU

data.title: Being Disciplined
data.description: When the Berlin wall fell, She went to the sauna, drank one beer, then went immediately home so she wouldn’t be tired for work the next day

data.title: Speaking “common sense”
data.description: She goes with the opinion of the majority & ensure balance of interests, even if it’s against her own views. That’s how Germany legalized gay marriage.

data.title: Being brave and bold
data.description: She became the first politician to confront Chancellor Helmut Kohl and call upon him to resign following revelations of corruption

data.title: Doing the right thing
data.description: Germany opened doors to 1M+ refugees and asylum seekers to protect freedom despite creating new enemies

sections.description: A Day in Her Life

data.title: Work on creating a better future for Germany and Europe
Have a glass of wine with friends
Listen to a game of the national football team

finalTitle: Angela Merkel’s Female Leader Resume Example
finalDescription: Merkel’s resume balances her ongoing passion for chemistry, her religious faith, and her love of football with the kind of hard hitting policy accomplishments we expect. The effect is a powerful resume example of a female leader who has the confidence to show the personal alongside the professional.

name: Steve Jobs
headerDescription: Steve Jobs’ CEO resume shows not just what he’d accomplished and was proud of when he rejoined Apple in 1996, but how his struggles and failures turned him into the person who could save the company.
pageTitle: Steve Jobs' Apple CEO Resume Example | Enhancv
pageDescription: Steve Jobs' CEO resume example is an inspiration, showing how including your struggles and failures can create a resume that really stands out and leaves an impression
twitterText: How did #stevejobs learn from his #mistakes to become the man who saved #Apple? Turns out that story has a lot to teach us about #grit, #passion, and thriving in spite of personal flaws. | via @Enhancv
facebookText: How did Steve Jobs learn from his mistakes to become the man who saved Apple? Turns out that story has a lot to teach us about grit, passion, and thriving in spite of personal flaws. | via @Enhancv
description: Jobs’ resume in 1996 shows a career was full of incredible successes and brutal failures.

sections.description: Jobs’ work up to 1996 shows both his tremendous skills and his deep flaws. In each role, he changes the way things are done and leaves and impact. Of course, he leaves the bigger lessons for the section on his struggles.

data.title: Pixar
data.description: Jobs turned a small division of Lucasfilm into a powerhouse studio, leading the company while it created the groundbreaking film Toy Story.

data.title: NeXT
data.description: As CEO of NeXT, Jobs led the creation of the revolutionary UNix-based NeXTSTEP OS. In doing so, they created computers that were five years ahead of their time.

data.title: Apple
data.description: Jobs built Apple into the second biggest manufacturer of small computers by pushing technologies like a Graphical User Interface, mouse, and fanless designs, culminating in one of the most successful IPOs of all time.

data.title: Dropping out of college
data.description: Jobs dropped out of a college his parents couldn’t afford but discovered he could learn in other ways

data.title: Launching failed products
data.description: The Lisa and Macintosh taught him the danger of releasing technically advanced products that are essentially still prototypes and don’t adequately solve user needs

data.title: Failing to identify a customer
data.description: The NeXt team never figured out who the customer was for the NeXT computer because Jobs didn’t adequately learn the lessons of Lisa and Macintosh

sections.description: His typical day

data.title: Thinking about the next “one more thing”
Checking out what Xerox PARC is up to these days

finalTitle: Find which struggles you’re most proud of overcoming
finalDescription: Struggles shape our skills and who we are. Explore this question to learn more about yourself and what you should be proud of. We've created a free worksheet that lets you do just that.
